column4: ok i dont get it.....every tutorial that tells me to do the command make or make install i get the same error
something about no gcc or the like?
if you installed that deb someone referred you to, dpkg -L <nameofdeb> | grep bin should show what you need to run
does the maya site have a recommendation?
it's source, so neither. You'll learn gobs if you try it
mandrake should create it's own menu.lst, and maybe. It's not hard to add the stanzas if needed
the -o loop means option loopback, it tells the kernel it's a file to mount as a device (roughly)
see the grub thing above? it talks about recoveringubuntuafterinstallingwindows
open the file manager, then select a folder and right click, you should see open terminal here
if you don't see it, type   alt-f2 pkill nautilus , nautilus will restart and you should see it
